column5: Unreal... uve made my 2008 just with this. Thank Moosebunk. I actually download ur reports and save them to a file because they are fun to read and unreal pictures. U make me dream of migrating north to enjoy the nature u so much embrace. Thanks again  Pachone
Thanks one more time Drew. The narrative in your reports is amazing and your photography, is in my opinion, world class.  John
yeah so at one point I had toyed with the idea of doing a 2008 review of my own, and this pretty much crushed that though! lol  Thanks dude, UF
A banner year for sure Bunk but I think I said the same last year  .  Living vicariously through you is all good though.  Well done Sir! The girls are sure growing fast!

Stellar year in review Drew....  Congratulations  Got me drooling again when I saw the pics of the arctic chars     just can't get over the colors on those fish.... simply amazing. Thanks for taking the time to put this report together and sharing it with us and good luck to ya in 2009 Now will keep a eye out for your ice reports Leechman
Very nice Drew. Would have liked to have read the version you lost, that's too bad. (Happened to me last month after spending 6hrs typing. Almost had a stroke on the spot, so I can relate  )
Possibly the best post I've read here so far! Excellent pictures, and congratulations!
amazing, a dream season as far as i'm concerned, congrats

That report was off the hook (sorry about the pun). Incredible!!! Pics of the Char were awesome. Pics after the fishing report were sick. Wow! Like Urban said, there is no chance of me doing a 2008 round up after seeing that.  lol  Congrats!

Moosebunk , Thanks for taking the time to show us your adventures abound. Its nice to see that your family is included in the adventures from time to time.You have a beautifull family. I am salivating over the giant PIKE........gotta love the way they smash those lures !!!!! Keep the posts coming in 2009.          MP
Thanks again for the replies guys.  Not expecting as much for 2009 but there will be fish...

Moose, you have an amazing talent for telling stories, and when you combine that with your skills at fishing & photography, your posts are always a favorite of mine. I know their gonna be a long, enjoyable read so I always set them aside till early the next morning and enjoy them with my morning cuppa, and you never disappoint.  Thanks for all your fantastic adventure tales over the years

I'm setting aside some time later on at home too just to enjoy fully your tales and pics, Moosebunk.  I guess that's why I don't buy fishing mags anymore.  lol  Tremendous advertures, Moosebunk, and I just wonder how you're able to get it all in!  Thank you for sharing with the rest of us.  Wow!

Awesome, simply Awesome. I am new to the OFC so it took me a couple of minutes to figure out where I had seen that Char photo before. Great year and a cover shot. Wicked!!  Best photos I have ever seen off a polaroid. LOL    Clarence
ummmmm.....WOW.  I think I speak for everyone....we are all quite GREEN in colour.  Simply incredible.  Remind me to go way up north for my next trip!
